title: plenti-stackey
description: 'plenti-stackey' is a tall, scrolling site design based on top of the plenti proto-type site. all of plenti's original components are expressed in this long tall scroller.
plent-stackey is also built with 'skeleton.css' which is a very small framework.
it was made to become a sort of, repository, of ui and ux stuff that i have learned over the years and always use. such as the full background image fx used ont the 'landing' component.
hopefully, this repo-site grows into something silly and wonderful soon!
author: claxx moldii
